question.ask: Questions 1~2  You and your classmates are talking about a robbery which happened in a bank last night. Ask your classmates two questions about it.

std.value: Did you hear the news that a robbery happened in a bank last night? How much has been robbed last night?
std.ai: Did you hear the news that a robbery happened in a bank last night? How much has been robbed last night?

std.value: Was anybody killed or injured? When did the policemen come to the crime scene?

std.value: When did this robbery happen? Has the robber been caught?
std.ai: When did this robbery happen? Has the robber been caught?

std.value: Where is that bank? Was anyone hurt?
